title: Please review, banned for third party
body: The other day I was banned for scripting/hacking/third party app, but the only third party app I use is Discord. The only other thing I ever have open during League is probably Google Chrome and I can't imagine that could have anything to do with it. I'd like another Moderator/Rioter to review my case and tell me I was scripting. I've spent 2,410 USD on my account and have 2,235 wins. Why would I script on my main account with so much time, effort and years worth of loyalty just to climb a few ranks.

replies.body:
There are a few things that also count for the use of unauthorized 3rd party programs:

* Letting someone use the account and they scripted
* Logging onto a PC infected with a script (Riot scans the PC upon log in, the program doesn't have to be active)
* Using a macro to help you in gameplay (like input Ryze combos in 0.15 seconds)
* Certain skin overlays like (and not limited to) MKLOL has unfair gameplay advantages in it, you don't have to use it for it to be detected

Keep in mind only Riot support can do anything to your account.

I've never downloaded any of those, but recently I went to my friend's house to catch up and played on his computer. If he had scripts on his computer would that be my fault? Even if I never knew or never opened them? I'll have to ask him, but if they banned me for that I hope it was just a misunderstanding.

The last sentence of your post definitely raises an eyebrow for me, but having a quick look through your match history I have to say that if you were using a third party program/cheat you should get a refund.  I see nothing crazy there.  

One other curious note here - I see a Soraka game where you purchased 4 tears... and went 0/12... that looks a little bit like intentional feeding to me, which is punishable.  

With that having been said, Riot basically never reverses their decisions regarding bans, so you're out of luck there.

Recently I've just been having fun and if I win, I win. I only purchased the tears when they were taking our nexus. There is nothing crazy, but apparently Riot thinks so. And I never intentionally feed, I sit under tower and if they dive me once I sit further back and so on.

The only way to guarantee that an actual Riot employee will review your case is to submit a support ticket.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
